divs: Sighting DetailsWe had set up our stealth cam on a deer trail to size up the deer for a buddy who is bow hunting our property (the only person allowed on our land to hunt) and in doing so we have many nights of typical shots and a handful of nights with unexplained shots. Can you offer any explanation? For some reason I can't submit my photo below this box I'm typing in. I sure they can be emailed tho. Thank you
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wassaic
This sighting has never been favorited.
